AD.synopsis: Guex, a tiefling refugee, practices his swordplay on a wooden dummy. If he received pointers from the player, his efforts are improved. Otherwise, he stuggles.

individual_metadata.synopsis: Tiefling is practicing his swing on  a dummy, trying to improve. The player can offer advice, potentially improving the tiefling's form.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The two provided sessions essentially depict the same event: a tiefling practicing his swordplay on a dummy with the possibility of receiving advice from the player. There is no narrative indication that one must occur before the other or that they form a cause-effect pair, nor do they suggest any mutually exclusive outcomes. It seems one session might be a duplicate or an alternative version of the same scene.

AD_2.speaker: Guex
AD_2.context: NodeContext: Concentrating, exerting himself - then flubbing it.

1.speaker: Guex
1.text: Swing, parry, strike - nngh. Damn, damn, damn!
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practicing his swing. Not looking at player.

3.speaker: Guex
3.text: Step, parry, strike - damn it! It's just not... agh!
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Trying and failing at swordplay practiceNodeContext: Frustrated. Practicing swordplay with little success - then reacts with alarm upon seeing a gith

14.speaker: Guex
14.text: Sorry, sorry. I've just never seen... your face is... well. I should get back to it.
14.context: NodeContext: Apologising, A little unnerved by a gith

55.speaker: Guex
55.text: Nothing but. Goblins in the wilds, out for blood. And the druids in here, looking to kick us out - or worse.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: You'd better surrender - that target's a far better fighter.

35.speaker: Guex
35.text: You have a better way? 'Cause I'm all ears.

47.speaker: Guex
47.text: We need to be ready for a fight - but I'm useless with a sword.
47.context: NodeContext: 'I'm doing my best, but my best isn't good enough'

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Clear your mind. Past mistakes don't matter. Focus on the present, the target.

20.speaker: Guex
20.text: You're right. I need to clear my head.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: He gives a long sigh, then nods.

60.speaker: Guex
60.text: And... step, parry, step-step, swing. Yes.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Does his sword drill successfullyNodeContext: Concentrates, then reacts happily upon executing his sword move well.

45.speaker: Guex
45.text: What do you think I'm doing? Brace, parry, swing - UGH!
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practices swing, and fails.NodeContext: trying and failing his swordplay

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Demonstrate a swing - show him the fluidity of movement he lacks.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player mimics a sword swing.

5.speaker: Guex
5.text: Like this, you mean? Step-step, strike! Yes!
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practicing his swing.NodeContext: Successful attempt

84.speaker: Guex
84.text: All right, so like this. Step-step, swivel - UGH!
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practicing his swing.NodeContext: Unsuccessful attempt

86.speaker: Player
86.text: No wonder you're struggling - you've no balance. Space your feet farther apart.

74.speaker: Guex
74.text: I'll try and brace them better - like so. Step-brace, parry, swing! Yes!
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practicing his swing.NodeContext: Successful attempt

68.speaker: Guex
68.text: You really know what you're doing! Found this by the road - bet you'll put it to good use.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: One last thing - don't shout out your moves like that. Spoils the surprise for your foe.

43.speaker: Guex
43.text: Oh... yes. When the time comes, it'll be nothing but battle cries from me.

62.speaker: Guex
62.text: Oh... yes. I'll bite my tongue when the time comes.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Keep training. In time, you'll make short work of any goblins.

23.speaker: Guex
23.text: Hopefully it's just the goblins we have to worry about - the druids are treating us like vermin.
23.context: NodeContext: He's still got misgivings - the goblins aren't the only threat

80.speaker: Guex
80.text: But I'll keep at it. Thank you.

13.speaker: Guex
13.text: Good advice - If I had two copper, I'd owe you one.
13.context: NodeContext: Grateful (but he has nothing to give the player)

12.speaker: Guex
12.text: Like this? All right... step-step, strike - UGH!

37.speaker: Guex
37.text: I think you made it worse. Keep the advice to yourself next time.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Show him how to coil his shoulder muscles into a more intimidating stance before striking.

24.speaker: Guex
24.text: He was only a boy. And I just... just froze while the worg tore his head clean off. Never again.
24.context: NodeContext: A memory. He recalls a time he froze in combat. But he still feels guilty and unsure.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: Try this swing. A little number I call 'The Legend's Strike'.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Inspire fear with a war cry - loosen bowels before you spill them - hrath ajak!

56.speaker: Guex
56.text: Har... hrath ajak! And swing! Yes!
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: He attempts another swing, successfully!NodeContext: Elated

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Try confusing your foe, like when you first saw me. Shout a question at them.

8.speaker: Guex
8.text: A question? I suppose it's worth a try...

58.speaker: Guex
58.text: Step-step - hello maggot face, how's your mother? - strike! It worked! Well I'll be.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Successful swordplay practiceNodeContext: Tries his swordplay - is surprised to succeed

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Don't waste good anger on your thoughts - use it on that target!

81.speaker: Guex
81.text: Rage, you say? RrrrrrrrrARGH! Step-brace, parry, swing - ugh.
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: He attempts another swing, unsuccessfully.NodeContext: Unconvincing attempt to tap into his rage while swinging his sword.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Then you're not angry enough, whelp! Again!

18.speaker: Guex
18.text: RrrrrarghWAGGH! Brace and step, swivel, swing! Yes!

6.speaker: Player
6.text: You're spineless. You should practice grovelling on your knees, not swordplay.

69.speaker: Guex
69.text: Brace and step, swivel, swing! Yes!
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: He attempts another swing, successfully!NodeContext: He attempts another swing, successfully!

0.speaker: Guex
0.text: Ha! Not so spineless now, am I?

32.speaker: Player
32.text: You need discipline, focus. Fix your gaze to a point, then guide your strikes to it.

90.speaker: Guex
90.text: Like this, then. Focus... focus... and strike! Yes!
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: Successful swordplay practiceNodeContext: Successful swordplay practice

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Put one foot in front of the other. Let momentum aid your strikes.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: This isn't a joust. Feint with your sword, then kick between the 'legs' instead.

67.speaker: Guex
67.text: Let's see then. Feint, kick, and - thrust!
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Needs new sneaking practics animation hereNodeContext: Reacts  to successful swordplay practice

17.speaker: Player
17.text: I could show you a thing or two, if you're a willing pupil.

57.speaker: Guex
57.text: Well, I'm in no position to turn down help.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Resume your flailing then, before I give you real cause to yelp.

50.speaker: Guex
50.text: N-no offence meant. I was just surprised - concentrating on this blasted target.
50.context: NodeContext: Rowing back on his earlier reaction to a gith player

42.speaker: Player
42.text: You yelp like a frightened dog because of my face?

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Calm down - I'm not really githyanki.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Relax - I'm not really a half-orc.

65.speaker: Guex
65.text: You're not...? For the best, I suppose. I wouldn't have fared well against the real thing.

16.speaker: Guex
16.text: Step, parry, strike - ugh. Again, again.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practicing his swing. Not looking at player.

26.speaker: Guex
26.text: Swing, parry, strike - nngh. Damn, damn, damn!
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practicing his swing. Not looking at player.

39.speaker: Guex
39.text: Step, parry, strike - damn it! It's just not landing.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practicing his swing. Not looking at player.NodeContext: Frustrated. Practicing swordplay with little success

48.speaker: Guex
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Practicing his swing. Not looking at player. Custom scene viewer needed.
